name: obsidian-plugin-template
description: A comprehensive template for building Obsidian plugins with best practices

scripts.dev: node esbuild.config.mjs --no-watch && node copy-assets.mjs && node build-css.mjs
scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-assets.mjs production && node build-css.mjs
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
